title: ApexSans announcement
content: Thirstype is pleased to preview the new sans serif typeface by chester & Rick Valicenti; ApexSans. Point your Safari browser at [http://www.thirstype.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414164012/http:/www.thirstype.com/) and click through the preview. And remember to sit tight and enjoy the animated gifs. (They took me hours to make...)

comments.content: While you are there, don't forget to check out their version of J-Lo
This family show nice apex. Great stuff chester, I see that you liked so much the new FontLab that it appear on the background of the animated gif!
